Pseudobulks sce data over donor x cell type

Source: R/pseudobulk.R
pseudobulk.Rd

Pseudobulks sce data over donor x cell type

pseudobulk(
  sce,
  cell_group_cols = c("donor", "cellType"),
  add_symbol = FALSE,
  just_counts = FALSE
)

Arguments

sce

Single cell experiment object

cell_group_cols

list of column names that create pseudobulk groups

add_symbol

Use Symbol from rowData as rownames

just_counts

Whether to return just the counts matrix or a SummarizedExperiment object (Default)

Value

Matrix of pseudobukled logcounts or SummarizedExperiment

Examples

## Default, pseudobulk by cellType and donor
pb_label_ab <- pseudobulk(sce_ab, just_counts = FALSE)
#> Unique Groups: 4
head(pb_label_ab)
#> class: SummarizedExperiment 
#> dim: 4 4 
#> metadata(0):
#> assays(1): counts
#> rownames(4): G-D1_A G-D1_B G-D2_A G-D2_B
#> rowData names(0):
#> colnames(4): D1_A D1_B D2_A D2_B
#> colData names(2): donor cellType

## Psuedobulk by user defined columns
pb_label_ab_region <- pseudobulk(sce_ab, cell_group_cols = c("cellType", "donor", "region"))
#> Unique Groups: 8
head(pb_label_ab_region)
#> class: SummarizedExperiment 
#> dim: 4 8 
#> metadata(0):
#> assays(1): counts
#> rownames(4): G-D1_A G-D1_B G-D2_A G-D2_B
#> rowData names(0):
#> colnames(8): A_D1_Front A_D1_Back ... B_D2_Back B_D2_Front
#> colData names(3): cellType donor region

## Use the Gene Symbol as the rownames
pb_label_test <- pseudobulk(sce.test, cell_group_cols = c("donor", "cellType.Broad"), add_symbol = TRUE)
#> Unique Groups: 12
#> Using Symbol as rownames
head(pb_label_test)
#> class: SummarizedExperiment 
#> dim: 6 12 
#> metadata(0):
#> assays(1): counts
#> rownames(6): AL669831.5 LINC00115 ... KLHL17 AL645608.8
#> rowData names(3): gene_id bp_length Symbol
#> colnames(12): Br5161_OPC Br5161_Oligo ... Br5161_Excit Br5212_Oligo
#> colData names(2): donor cellType.Broad

## Only output the count matrix
pb_label_test_counts <- pseudobulk(sce.test, cell_group_cols = c("donor", "cellType.Broad"), just_counts = TRUE)
#> Unique Groups: 12
head(pb_label_test_counts)
#>                 Br5161_OPC Br5161_Oligo Br5212_Inhib Br5161_Astro Br5161_Micro
